name: @danielkalen/exit-intent
description: The source code for Exit Intent.com

scripts.postversion: echo \'$(json -f package.json version)\' > .version.coffee && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:pretty && npm run build:ugly
scripts.build:ugly: simplyimport -i src/exit-intent.coffee | coffee -b -s -c > dist/js/exit-intent.pretty.js && uglifyjs dist/js/exit-intent.pretty.js -m -c keep_fargs,unused=false -o dist/js/exit-intent.js
scripts.build:pretty: simplyimport -i src/exit-intent.coffee | coffee -b -s -c > dist/js/exit-intent.pretty.js && cp -f dist/js/exit-intent.pretty.js dist/js/exit-intent.js

author: Daniel Kalen
